text: James Matthew Hood (born May 15, 1962) is an American lawyer. He was the 39th Attorney General of Mississippi. He is a Democrat. He was elected in 2003 and left office in 2020. He was the Democratic nominee for Governor of Mississippi in 2019. He lost the election to Tate Reeves. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Mississippi Category:Politicians from Mississippi Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jim Hood
